promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic legendary serpent fire-type with regal scales. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Regalecton, a gigantic legendary serpent fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: ember. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word serpent or fire or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, serpent-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Siamese-bodied dragon of volcanic flame, Regalecton guards fiery peaks. Its aura burns all who challenge its rule.
